name: com.sfsucsc631team3b.fulldomepreviz
description:
SFSU CSC 631 2023 - Team 3B Fulldome Previzualization Plugin in Unity

The Fulldome Previzualization Plugin modifies the USD menu to allow you to: 
 - Import USD files with animation clips
 - Export USD files with modified animations
 - Add a fulldome camera rig to any specified camera in the scene
 - Export timeline information to a JSON file

Unity Version: Unity.2022.2.9f1
